term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - enhancement reaction in analytical chemistry
term.title: enhancement reaction

item.text: A reaction which enables a favourable measurement to be made in which the constituent which is finally measured has not been magnified in any way (cf. amplification reaction).

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 2553. 'Recommendations on use of the term amplification reactions' on page 2556 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254122553)
